QuestData.Title: Glowcap Mushrooms
QuestData.Description: I've seen your kind use shiny round pieces of metal to trade for things that you need. We're not so different from you. We use shiny round mushrooms as our currency.$B$BGlowcap mushrooms grow everywhere in the marsh, you just have to know how to pick them from the ground without wrecking them. I'll teach you how to do it, if you promise to bring us some for our reserves. What do you say, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 10 Glowcaps to Msshi'fn at Sporeggar in Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find any glowcaps, $N? They're literally everywhere in the marsh.$B$BYou can spot their bright glow from far away if you pay attention.
QuestData.RewardText: This will help us trade with other sporelings for food and supplies. Sporeggar thanks you, $N!
